body:
Arch with Avahi.
```
# Begin /etc/nsswitch.conf

passwd: files
group: files
shadow: files
publickey: files

hosts: files mdns dns myhostname
networks: files

protocols: files
services: files
ethers: files
rpc: files

netgroup: files

# End /etc/nsswitch.conf
```
```
abraithwaite at arch in ~ 
$ pkgfile /etc/nsswitch.conf
core/filesystem
abraithwaite at arch in ~ 
$ pacman -Q filesystem
filesystem 2015.02-1
```
